description: The Hardy Kiwi (Actinidia arguta) is a unique and amazing plant species that produces delicious and nutritious edible fruit. Hardy Kiwi is cold-hardy and can survive harsh winters, yet it produces a large amount of extremely sweet, succulent fruit that can be eaten fresh or used in recipes. In addition, the plant is easy to care for and even produces attractive vine-like foliage. It is also highly beneficial to its surrounding natural habitats, as its fragrant vines attract birds and various beneficial insects. Hardy Kiwi is an amazing species that every gardener should have!
